content.heading: Definition and Basic Functions
content.text: A computer is a programmable machine capable of performing complex calculations, processing vast amounts of information, and automating tasks efficiently. It operates based on four primary functions:

bullet_points.title: Input
bullet_points.text: Receiving data and commands from external devices such as a keyboard, mouse, scanner, or microphone.

bullet_points.title: Processing
bullet_points.text: The CPU interprets and executes the instructions given by the user or software.

bullet_points.title: Storage
bullet_points.text: Computers store data temporarily in RAM and permanently in storage devices like hard drives or SSDs.

bullet_points.title: Output
bullet_points.text: The processed data is displayed or conveyed through output devices such as monitors, speakers, or printers.

content.heading: Components of a Computer
content.text: A computer system consists of both hardware (physical components) and software (programs and instructions) that work together to execute tasks efficiently.

bullet_points.title: CPU
bullet_points.text: The brain of the computer, responsible for executing instructions and performing calculations.

bullet_points.title: Memory (RAM)
bullet_points.text: Temporarily stores data for quick access while programs are running.

bullet_points.title: Storage Devices
bullet_points.text: Hard drives (HDDs) and SSDs store files, applications, and the operating system.

bullet_points.title: Input Devices
bullet_points.text: Keyboards, mice, touchscreens, and other peripherals used for entering data.

bullet_points.title: Output Devices
bullet_points.text: Monitors, speakers, and printers that display or convey the processed information.

bullet_points.title: Operating System (OS)
bullet_points.text: Software such as Windows, macOS, or Linux that manages hardware resources and provides a user interface.

bullet_points.title: Application Software
bullet_points.text: Programs like word processors, web browsers, and video editing tools that help users perform specific tasks.

bullet_points.title: System Software
bullet_points.text: Utilities and drivers that ensure smooth communication between hardware and software components.
